title: `panic` on geth/downloader/beaconsync.go:220
body:
version `Geth/v1.11.0-unstable-722bb210-20221117/linux-amd64/go1.19.3`

Panic on the disco
```
 Dec 04 14:06:30 bootnode-azure-brazilsouth-001 geth WARN [12-04|13:06:29.937] Snapshot is not continuous with chain snaproot=9ac2ed..16d504 chainroot=e459a1..23facd

Dec 04 14:06:37 bootnode-azure-brazilsouth-001 geth goroutine 6345 [running]:

Dec 04 14:06:37 bootnode-azure-brazilsouth-001 geth github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:527 +0x911
Dec 04 14:06:37 bootnode-azure-brazilsouth-001 geth github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).synchronise(0x3?, {0x0, 0x0}, {0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...}, ...)
Dec 04 14:06:37 bootnode-azure-brazilsouth-001 geth github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:439 +0x512
Dec 04 14:06:37 bootnode-azure-brazilsouth-001 geth github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*beaconBackfiller).resume.func1()
Dec 04 14:06:37 bootnode-azure-brazilsouth-001 geth github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/beaconsync.go:108 +0x96
Dec 04 14:06:37 bootnode-azure-brazilsouth-001 geth created by github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*beaconBackfiller).resume
Dec 04 14:06:37 bootnode-azure-brazilsouth-001 geth github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/beaconsync.go:98 +0x136
```
I've stopped geth now, to avoid the panic-cycle. cc @skylenet

```
$ docker run -it -v "/geth/.ethereum":"/root/.ethereum" ethereum/client-go --datadir=/root/.ethereum db metadata

This is the very first of the panics, which did not happen in conjuction with a reboot (slightly cleaned) :
```
INFO [12-04|12:04:00.172] Forkchoice requested sync to new head number=16,111,322 hash=d0c18d..8b964d
INFO [12-04|12:04:01.100] Imported new chain segment number=16,111,306 hash=95fa2a..39901e blocks=5 txs=704 mgas=70.796 elapsed=13.613s mgasps=5.200 age=3m14s dirty=993.03MiB
INFO [12-04|12:04:03.184] Imported new chain segment number=16,111,307 hash=af366d..bd916b blocks=1 txs=267 mgas=22.671 elapsed=2.084s mgasps=10.876 age=3m4s dirty=994.42MiB
INFO [12-04|12:04:03.185] Downloader queue stats receiptTasks=0 blockTasks=0 itemSize=79.14KiB throttle=3313
INFO [12-04|12:04:24.338] Forkchoice requested sync to new head number=16,111,324 hash=5cea4e..ecd1d0
ERROR[12-04|12:04:26.120] Error in block freeze operation err="block receipts missing, can't freeze block 15606390"
INFO [12-04|12:04:27.393] Imported new chain segment number=16,111,312 hash=c6ebac..c1c3ab blocks=5 txs=948 mgas=69.596 elapsed=14.120s mgasps=4.929 age=2m28s dirty=995.57MiB ignored=1
INFO [12-04|12:04:35.997] Forkchoice requested sync to new head number=16,111,325 hash=7d3760..38cac6
INFO [12-04|12:04:47.802] Imported new chain segment number=16,111,321 hash=272ca0..25cf33 blocks=9 txs=1217 mgas=142.953 elapsed=20.409s mgasps=7.004 age=1m dirty=997.49MiB
INFO [12-04|12:04:48.731] Imported new chain segment number=16,111,323 hash=88ec6d..20dd8f blocks=2 txs=240 mgas=18.027 elapsed=928.874ms mgasps=19.408 dirty=996.39MiB
INFO [12-04|12:04:54.932] Imported new chain segment number=16,111,325 hash=0946fa..46f44b blocks=2 txs=253 mgas=7.600 elapsed=130.270ms mgasps=58.340 dirty=995.09MiB ignored=1
WARN [12-04|12:05:02.230] Ignoring payload with missing parent number=16,111,326 hash=3a0143..2678a4 parent=7d3760..38cac6
WARN [12-04|12:05:13.531] Ignoring payload with missing parent number=16,111,327 hash=e97873..822c73 parent=3a0143..2678a4
INFO [12-04|12:05:15.114] Forkchoice requested sync to new head number=16,111,327 hash=e97873..822c73
WARN [12-04|12:05:15.114] Beacon chain gapped head=16,111,325 newHead=16,111,327
INFO [12-04|12:05:15.256] Syncing beacon headers downloaded=90 left=0 eta=0s
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x1c0 pc=0xad6fdb]
goroutine 1555316 [running]:
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).syncWithPeer(0xc000041500, 0x0, {0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...}, ...)
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:491 +0x49b
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*Downloader).synchronise(0xc168424d80?, {0x0, 0x0}, {0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...}, ...)
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/downloader.go:439 +0x512
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*beaconBackfiller).resume.func1()
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/beaconsync.go:108 +0x96
created by github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*beaconBackfiller).resume
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/beaconsync.go:98 +0x136

```

`
INFO [12-04|12:04:54.932] Imported new chain segment number=16,111,325 hash=0946fa..46f44b blocks=2 txs=253 mgas=7.600 elapsed=130.270ms mgasps=58.340 dirty=995.09MiB ignored=1
`
^ That number is the tail

Chain progression: we have `325:0946fa`, but we do not have `325:7d3760`. We later detect 
the gap, and try to sync to `327`, which is a descendant of (the missing) `325:7d3760`. 
``` 
325: `0946fa`     `7d3760`   // Imported number=16,111,325 hash=`0946fa`
326:              `3a0143`   // Ignoring payload with missing parent number
327:              `e97873`   // Ignoring payload with missing parent number
```
Could it be that our tail is `325@0946fa`, but later on when we detect the that `325@0946fa` is 
reorged, we remove it but do not update the tail-marker?

```json
{
  "Subchains": [
    {
      "Head": 16111652,
      "Tail": 16111325,
      "Next": "0x5cea4e7a3419cb3ac7fa51ca087576b952b7d6409c2850cbb0c3878433ecd1d0"
    }
  ]
}
```

cc @karalabe

Any update on this please, my Goerli node is having the same issue.

```

Dec 09 16:09:48 ip-10-0-29-185 geth[478486]:         github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader/beaconsync.go:108 +0x96
Dec 09 16:09:48 ip-10-0-29-185 geth[478486]: created by github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/eth/downloader.(*beaconBackfiller).resume

Dec 09 16:09:48 ip-10-0-29-185 systemd[1]: geth.service: Main process exited, code=exited, status=2/INVALIDARGUMENT
```

Triage discussion, in the method here: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/722bb210bfe86984b39c80dcab79405157338f25/eth/downloader/skeleton.go#L1174  -- add some error-logs and diagnostic info in case the head or the tail is nil.

Deleted 1TB of Georli chaindata, and started the sync again, I was in hurry and I needed this for indexers. Therefore, no logs left. 
Note: I was running archive node.
